key_elements: TAB_ITEMS constant array with 4 tab definitions
Integration with custom Tabs and TabPanel UI components
MUI Icons imports (Dashboard, Timeline, Group, BarChart)

patterns_discovered.description: Component accepts optional content props (summaryContent, timelineContent, teamContent, statsContent) allowing parent components to control tab content
patterns_discovered.benefits: Flexible composition, reusability, separation of concerns

patterns_discovered.description: TAB_ITEMS defined as constant with label, value, and icon for each tab
patterns_discovered.benefits: Single source of truth for tab structure, maintainability

patterns_discovered.description: Uses custom Tabs and TabPanel components from '../src/components/ui/Tabs' instead of direct MUI implementation
patterns_discovered.benefits: Centralized styling, consistent theming, easier to modify behavior globally

patterns_discovered.description: Each tab includes both text label and MUI icon
patterns_discovered.benefits: Better visual hierarchy, improved accessibility, enhanced UX

gotchas_discovered.description: Custom Tabs component imported from '../src/components/ui/Tabs' while other MUI components imported from '@mui/material'. This suggests custom UI wrapper exists but path structure may be non-standard.
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Verify the relative import path is correct for the actual project structure to avoid runtime errors

gotchas_discovered.description: All content props (summaryContent, timelineContent, teamContent, statsContent) are optional with undefined as implicit default
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Add fallback content or loading states if tabs are expected to always have content

gotchas_discovered.description: Component doesn't validate that activeTab matches one of the TAB_ITEMS values
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Add prop validation or ensure parent component correctly manages tab state

approach_outcome.description: ProjectOverviewTabs component successfully created as a reusable, composable tab interface for project overview views
approach_outcome.notes: Component provides clean API with icon-based tabs and flexible content injection. Leverages custom UI components for consistency.

recommendations.suggestion: Add PropTypes or expand TypeScript to validate activeTab is one of valid values from TAB_ITEMS
recommendations.rationale: Prevents bugs from parent components passing invalid tab values

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding loading states or empty state messages for optional content props
recommendations.rationale: Improves UX when tab content is not yet available

recommendations.suggestion: Document the expected structure of custom Tabs/TabPanel components for future developers
recommendations.rationale: Custom UI wrapper is non-standard; documentation will prevent integration errors

recommendations.suggestion: Add unit tests for tab switching and content rendering logic
recommendations.rationale: Ensures component behaves correctly as tab state changes
